title: DiscountingTypeEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the method of calculating discounted payment amounts. This enumerations combines the FpML DiscountingTypeEnum and FraDiscountingEnum enumerations.

oneOf.title: AFMA
oneOf.description: As specified by the Australian Financial Markets Association (AFMA) OTC Financial Product Conventions. This discounting method should not be used for a trade documented under a legal framework where the 2006 ISDA Definitions have been incorporated.

oneOf.title: FRA
oneOf.description: As specified by the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 8.4. Discounting, paragraph (b).

oneOf.title: FRAYield
oneOf.description: As specified by the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 8.4. Discounting, paragraph (e).

oneOf.title: Standard
oneOf.description: As specified by the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 8.4. Discounting, paragraph (a).
